pages.text: Whether you hide your word or you disclose it, He knows what is inside the chests
Does He not know what He created? He is the nice, the well informed
He is the One who made the earth tame for you, so walk in its tracts and eat of His provision. The resurrection is to Him
Are you safe from the One in the sky that He does not make you sink in the earth when it suddenly shakes
Or are you safe from the One in the sky that He does not send a sandstorm upon you? Then you are going to know how My warning is
And those before them have certainly denied, so how was My rejection (and punishment)
Or did they not look at the birds above them spreading (their) wings and folding them? What holds them except the beneficent? He sees everything
Or who is this, the one who is an army for you helping you, other than the beneficent? The disbelievers are only in deception
Or who is this, the one who provides for you if He withholds His provision? No, but they insist on rebellion and hatred
Is someone who walks with his face downward better guided or someone who walks properly on a straight path
Say: He is the One who created you and made the hearing and the sight and the heart for you, but you thank a little
say: He is the One who scattered you on the earth, and you will be gathered to Him
And they say: when is this promise, if you are truthful
Say: the knowledge of it is only with God, and I am only to warn clearly
